thread.title: Madiha Elkhadem
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Madiha Elkhadem

author: Madiha Elkhadem
title: Madiha Elkhadem
text: Cori Naron, Trust and Estate Administrator for David Sklar Ltd. is one of the best professionals I have ever had the privilege of meeting. Her handling of my file has been second to none! She is not only an extremely warm and thoughtful individual, but her meticulous attention to detail and amazing availability and patience for her clients has truly made a difficult situation much easier. She is by far the best professional I have ever dealt with bar none!
